title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 12 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 12 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2: American socialists, like The Squad and Bernie Sanders, are silent over the Cuban protests. How can the United States support the protesters? Will the Biden Administration let Cuba go the way of Hong Kong? Phone lines were jammed with Cuban-Americans telling their dramatic personal stories and offering suggestions to help Cuba. "Democrat Socialists" will try to confuse the reason for Cuba's failure. Biden has a meeting with big city mayors to talk about rising crime. Democrats "Defund the police" cry has led to less police, and surprise, surprise: MORE crime!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
